intro.title: About Quantitative Trading
intro.description: Quantitative trading uses mathematical models and computer programs for automated trading. Through preset trading strategies and parameters, the system monitors the market 24/7 and executes trades automatically, eliminating emotional interference and improving trading efficiency and stability.
intro.feature2Desc: Rational decisions based on market data and indicators
intro.feature3Desc: Built-in risk management with auto stop-loss/profit
intro.feature4Desc: Millisecond response time, seize every opportunity
intro.step1Desc: Add exchange API keys in settings
intro.step2Desc: Choose strategy type and configure parameters
intro.step3Desc: Start strategy, system executes trades automatically
intro.riskDesc: Quantitative trading involves risks. Past performance does not guarantee future returns. Please invest cautiously according to your risk tolerance. It is recommended to test strategies with small amounts first.

help.title: Help Center
help.subtitle: Learn about ARX platform features and frequently asked questions

company.title: About ARX
company.content: ARX is a leading global digital asset trading platform, dedicated to providing secure, efficient, and professional cryptocurrency trading services to users worldwide. We have a top-tier technical team and extensive financial industry experience to deliver a one-stop digital asset trading solution.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To enable everyone to participate in digital asset trading safely and conveniently. We believe blockchain technology will reshape the future of finance, and ARX is committed to being a driver and leader of this transformation.

team.title: Professional Team
team.content: Our core team comes from top global financial institutions and technology companies, with rich experience in trading system development and financial market expertise, ensuring stable platform operation and continuous innovation.

global.title: Global Service
global.content: ARX supports multiple languages and serves users in many countries and regions worldwide. We provide 24/7 non-stop customer service to ensure users receive professional support at any time.

advantage.title: Core Advantages
advantage.content: Bank-grade security architecture, millisecond-level matching engine, diverse trading products, professional quantitative tools, and comprehensive risk control systems make ARX a trusted trading platform for millions of users.

security.title: Security Guarantee
security.content: We employ multi-signature technology, cold and hot wallet separation, SSL encrypted transmission, and risk monitoring systems to comprehensively protect user assets.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: For any questions, please feel free to contact our customer service team

trading.title: Spot Trading
trading.description: Buy and sell major cryptocurrencies in real-time with professional charts and market depth data

faq1.q: How do I trade on the spot market?
faq1.a: Go to the trading page, select a trading pair, enter the quantity and price for buying or selling, then confirm and submit your order. Both market and limit orders are supported.

faq2.q: What are limit and market orders?
faq2.a: A limit order executes at your specified price when the market reaches it. A market order executes immediately at the current best available market price.

faq3.a: The platform uses a tiered fee structure, offering different rates based on user level and trading volume. Please refer to the fee schedule page for specific rates.

contracts.title: Contract Trading
contracts.description: Perpetual and time-based contracts with leverage trading and long/short positions

faq1.a: Perpetual contracts are derivative contracts with no expiration date. You can trade long or short with leverage, amplifying both potential gains and risks.

faq2.a: Time contracts are short-term prediction contracts where you predict the price direction after a specified time period. Correct predictions earn returns.

faq3.a: Maintain sufficient margin balance, control position size and leverage, set stop-loss orders, and closely monitor market conditions and your positions.

assets.title: Asset Management
assets.description: View account asset overview, transaction records, and fund transfer history

faq1.q: How do I view my assets?
faq1.a: Go to the Assets page to view your total asset value, individual currency balances, available balances, and frozen balances.

faq2.a: Assets are temporarily frozen when you have pending orders, open contract positions, or pending withdrawal requests.

deposit.title: Deposit & Withdraw
deposit.description: Support for multiple cryptocurrency deposits and withdrawals with fast processing

faq1.a: Go to the Deposit/Withdraw page, select the cryptocurrency and network, copy the deposit address, and transfer from your external wallet. Make sure to verify the network type.

faq2.q: How long does a deposit take?
faq2.a: Deposit time depends on blockchain network confirmations. Generally, it takes several block confirmations, typically ranging from a few minutes to tens of minutes.

faq3.a: Withdrawals require identity verification and have daily limits. Different verification levels correspond to different withdrawal limits. Check your account settings for details.

swap.title: Swap
swap.description: Quick one-click exchange between cryptocurrencies with instant quotes and zero slippage

faq1.a: Swap is a quick cryptocurrency exchange service. You can instantly convert between different cryptocurrencies without placing orders, completing transactions at instant quotes.

faq2.q: How long is a swap quote valid?
faq2.a: Swap quotes are typically valid for 10-30 seconds. Confirm your transaction within this period to lock in the price.

quant.title: Quantitative Trading
quant.description: Professional quantitative strategy tools supporting grid trading, DCA, and other automated strategies

faq1.a: Quantitative trading uses mathematical models and computer programs for automated trading. Through preset strategies and parameters, the system monitors the market 24/7 and executes trades.

faq2.q: How do I create a quantitative strategy?
faq2.a: First, configure exchange API keys in settings. Then go to the Quant page, select a strategy type (grid trading, DCA, etc.), configure parameters, and start.

faq3.q: Are there risks with quantitative trading?
faq3.a: Quantitative trading carries market risks. Strategies may incur losses during extreme market volatility. Set parameters reasonably, control positions, and regularly check strategy performance.

earn.title: Earn
earn.description: Flexible and fixed-term earning products to grow your assets

faq1.q: What types of earning products are available?
faq1.a: We offer flexible (withdraw anytime) and fixed-term (set duration) products with different APY rates and minimum investment amounts.

faq2.a: Earnings are calculated daily based on the product's APY and your investment amount. Flexible earnings are credited in real-time; fixed-term earnings are settled at maturity.

kyc.title: KYC Verification
kyc.description: Complete identity verification to unlock more features and higher limits

faq1.a: KYC is a necessary step for regulatory compliance. After verification, you can use withdrawal features and enjoy higher trading and withdrawal limits.

faq2.q: What documents are needed for KYC?
faq2.a: You need to provide photos of a valid ID (ID card/passport) front and back, plus a selfie holding the document. Ensure photos are clear and legible.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find quick answers to your questions

account.q1: How do I register an ARX account?
account.a1: Click the register button on the homepage, enter your email or phone number, set a password, and complete registration. You can also register quickly with a wallet address.
account.q2: What if I forget my password?
account.a2: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page, verify via email or phone, and reset your password.

security.q1: How do I protect my account security?
security.a1: Enable two-factor authentication, use strong passwords, change passwords regularly, avoid logging in on public devices, and beware of phishing sites and scams.
security.q2: What if I notice suspicious account activity?
security.a2: Change your password immediately, check recent login and transaction history. Contact customer service to freeze your account if you see suspicious activity.

trading.a1: The platform supports trading of dozens of major cryptocurrencies including BTC, ETH, USDT, and more. Check the trading page for specific trading pairs.
trading.q2: Is there a minimum trading amount?
trading.a2: Different trading pairs have different minimum trading amounts, typically a few dollars equivalent. Check the trading page for specific limits.

security.title: Security Tips
security.tip1: Never share your password or verification codes with anyone
security.tip2: Verify the official website domain to avoid phishing sites
security.tip3: Don't click unknown links or download unknown files
security.tip4: If contacted by someone claiming to be customer service, verify through official channels
